mapper.select: select table_num, sts_num as cnt, reserve_state as stat, cv.cate_value_name as tabletype from store_table_set sts left join reservation r on r.reserve_table_idx = sts.sts_idx and store_idx = #{storeIdx} and reserve_date = TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and reserve_time = #{time} left join category cg on sts.sts_type_idx = cg.cate_idx left join cate_value cv on cg.cate_value_idx = cv.cate_value_idx order by table_num asc

SELECT r.reserve_idx, r.reserve_date, r.reserve_time, r.reserve_count, r.reserve_table_idx, r.request, r.reserve_state, r.reserve_applydate, u.user_name, up.user_tel, up.user_nickname FROM reservation r JOIN eats_user u ON r.user_idx = u.user_idx JOIN user_profile up ON u.user_idx = up.user_idx WHERE r.store_idx = #{storeIdx} AND r.reserve_date = TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND r.reserve_time = #{time}
